item.title: change the hyphon
item.description:
https://budibase.com/ - Budibase is an open-source low-code platform for creating internal apps in minutes. Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, MSSQL, MongoDB, Rest API, Docker, K8s
https://www.appsmith.com/ - Low code project to build admin panels, internal tools, and dashboards. Integrates with 15+ databases and any API.
https://www.tooljet.com/ - Extensible low-code framework for building business applications. Connect to databases, cloud storages, GraphQL, API endpoints, Airtable, etc and build apps using drag and drop application builder.
